(function() { var habits = [{ name: 'Morning Meditation', done: [true, true, false, true, false, false, false] }, { name: 'Read 20 Pages', done: [true, true, true, true, true, false, false] }]; function render() { var list = api.root.querySelector('#habit-list-pro'); if (!list) return; list.innerHTML = ''; var totalDone = 0; var totalPossible = habits.length * 7; var maxStreak = 0; habits.forEach(function(habit, hIdx) { var item = document.createElement('div'); item.className = 'habit-item'; var currentStreak = 0; habit.done.forEach(function(d) { if(d) totalDone++; }); for (var i = habit.done.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) { if (habit.done[i]) currentStreak++; else break; } if (currentStreak > maxStreak) maxStreak = currentStreak; var dotsHtml = ''; var dayLabels = ['M','T','W','T','F','S','S']; habit.done.forEach(function(d, dIdx) { dotsHtml += '
' + dayLabels[dIdx] + '
'; }); item.innerHTML = '
üî• ' + currentStreak + 'd
' + dotsHtml + '
'; list.appendChild(item); }); var avg = totalPossible > 0 ? Math.round((totalDone / totalPossible) * 100) : 0; var avgEl = api.root.querySelector('#weekly-avg-pro'); var streakEl = api.root.querySelector('#best-streak-pro'); if (avgEl) avgEl.innerText = avg + '%'; if (streakEl) streakEl.innerText = maxStreak + ' days'; } async function handleNameChange(e) { var target = e.target; if (target.classList.contains('habit-name-input')) { var idx = parseInt(target.getAttribute('data-idx')); if (!isNaN(idx)) { habits[idx].name = target.value; await api.saveState(habits); } } } async function handleDelete(e) { var target = e.target; while (target && !target.classList.contains('btn-delete-habit')) { target = target.parentElement; } if (target && target.classList.contains('btn-delete-habit')) { var idx = parseInt(target.getAttribute('data-idx')); if (!isNaN(idx) && confirm('Delete "' + habits[idx].name + '"?')) { habits.splice(idx, 1); await api.saveState(habits); render(); } } } async function addHabitHandler() { var name = prompt('Enter habit name:'); if (name && name.trim()) { habits.push({ name: name.trim(), done: [false, false, false, false, false, false, false] }); await api.saveState(habits); render(); } } async function resetWeekHandler() { if (confirm('Reset all habits for this week?')) { habits.forEach(function(habit) { habit.done = [false, false, false, false, false, false, false]; }); await api.saveState(habits); render(); } } async function toggleDayHandler(e) { var target = e.target; if (target.classList.contains('day-dot')) { var hIdx = parseInt(target.getAttribute('data-h')); var dIdx = parseInt(target.getAttribute('data-d')); if (!isNaN(hIdx) && !isNaN(dIdx)) { habits[hIdx].done[dIdx] = !habits[hIdx].done[dIdx]; await api.saveState(habits); render(); } } } function setupEventListeners() { var btnAdd = api.root.querySelector('#btn-add-habit-pro'); if (btnAdd) { btnAdd.addEventListener('click', addHabitHandler); } var btnReset = api.root.querySelector('#btn-reset-week-pro'); if (btnReset) { btnReset.addEventListener('click', resetWeekHandler); } var widget = api.root.querySelector('#habit-pro-widget'); if (widget) { widget.addEventListener('change', handleNameChange); widget.addEventListener('click', function(e) { toggleDayHandler(e); handleDelete(e); }); } } async function init() { var saved = await api.getState(); if (Array.isArray(saved)) habits = saved; render(); setupEventListeners(); } init(); })();
